  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How lightening is created</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Beleuchtung erstellt wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment l'allégement est créé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como o lightening é criado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come l'alleggerimento è creato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς lightening δημιουργείται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se crea el aligeramiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates how ions are involved in the formation of lightening during a thunder storm.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meteorology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lightening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates, wie Ionen in die 
Anordnung des Erleichterns während eines Donnersturms miteinbezogen 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation que les demostrates comment des ions 
sont impliqués dans la formation de l'éclairage pendant un tonnerre 
donnent l'assaut à.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates como os íons são 
envolvidos na formação de iluminar durante uma tempestade do 
trovão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates come gli ioni sono 
coinvolti nella formazione di alleggerimento durante la tempesta di 
tuono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates πώς τα ιόντα 
περιλαμβάνονται στο σχηματισμό lightening κατά τη διάρκεια μιας
θύελλας βροντής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates cómo los iones 
están implicados en la formación de aligerar durante una tormenta 
del trueno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meteorologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleuchtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
